mean_cn: n. 讲演，讲课，讲座；  vi. 讲演；  vt. 向…讲演，教训
mean_en: a talk or speech given to a group of people to teach them about a particular subject
word_etyma: lect讲，读+ure名词后缀 → 公开讲说 → 讲课，讲座
deformation_desc: 像不像是上课时老师拿着教鞭指点江山呢？
sentence: He gave a lecture in front of many people.
sentence_trans: 他在很多人面前发表了演讲。
